page.title: 06THE VILLAGE GREEN
page.content: THE VILLAGE GREEN IS ONE OF THE FEATURES OF AINSDALE.IT IS SITUATED ON LIVERPOOL ROAD. IN THE MIDDLE THERE IS A MEMORIAL STONE FOR THE PEOPLE WHO DIED IN THE WARS.EVERY YEAR, ON THE 11TH OF NOVEMBER THERE IS A SERVICE WHEN THE GUIDE AND SCOUTS AS WELL AS THE SUNDAY SCHOOLS LAY WREATHS. THE NAMES OF THE DEAD ARE WRITTEN AS WELL AS THE FOLLOWING_ "IN MEMORY OF THOSE WHO GAVE THEIR LIVES IN THE SECOND WORLD WAR, FROM 1939_1945." THE GREEN IS THE SITE OF THE"AINSDALE SHOW"EACH YEAR.THERE ARE MANY STALLS A HORTICULTURAL SHOW AND A FLORAL QUEEN. AINSDALE C.E. SCHOOL P.T.A. HAVE WON THE BEST STALL PRIZE FOR TWO YEARS.
